value: Minedumps from the gold industry is still a common sight around Krugersdorp

province, located to the west of

value: Krugersdorp was the hometown of engineer George Pratley who invented Pratley Putty in 1948. Pratley Putty was used by NASA in 1969 on Apollo XI's Eagle landing craft and is the only South Africa product ever to go to the moon.
follow the N14 west until it joins the R28 (

) turnoff from the N1, follow Gordon Road for 1km until it crosses Ontdekkers Road, turn right into Onttdekkers and follow it until it changes name to Voortrekker Road. Follow Voortrekker Road into Krugersdorp.
Springbok in the Krugersdorp Game Reserve
hours=Main gate is open from 8AM to 6PM, Lion camp and Aviary is open 8AM to 5PM
price=R40 per adult, R20 per child for day visitors

content=A 1400 hectare reserve with hippo, rhino, giraffe, a number of species of buck, wildebeest, giraffe, zebra, ostrich, lions and a bird aviary. Lion feeding at 10AM every Sunday. A caravan park and lodge is located within the park.
content=Offers game drive, horse trails, an observatory, abseiling, swimming pool and
and picnic areas. Wide range of animals.
content=South African National Drag Racing Championships
directions=On the R24 just west of town
content=50 caravan and tent sites. Convenience store, take aways, pool, laundry and 5 star ablution block.
directions=On the R24 just west of town
content=Bed&Breakfast as well as self catering chalets within the Game Reserve
content=Guesthouse, with 7 double rooms en suite, full breakfast included.

content=The Lodge (3 stars), has beautiful double and family en suite self-catering units. These units lead off a large court yard with unique fire place. A self-catering two sleeper fisher-mans Log Cabin and the luxury Seringa Berry Log Cabin for the more romantic weekend break.
The courtyard can also be a convenient get together area if the lodge is booked as a block booking for extended family weekends, birthday parties etc. 
The venue also offers facilities for conferences and smaller weddings, set in lush gardens with the Magaliesberg mountains in the background.
FACILITIES & ACTIVITIES:
A rustic furnished lounge with DSTV is available to those that enjoy their news and sport. 
Games room with a full size Snooker table, dart board and bar are for residents only. 
Conference and function area seating 100 guests with own Bar, Boma and ablutions. 
A pool set in a lovely garden with rolling lawns over looking a small dam is the perfect place to unwind.
The above facilities are ideal for Team building events, conferencing and weddings. Please contact Arno for more details.
name=The Rabbit Hole Guest House & Restaurant

directions=Continue with Ontdekkers Road in the direction of Krugersdorp. The road name changes to Voortrekker Road and then to Viljoen Streeet. The 3rd property on the left hand side after the Key West Shopping Centre is The Rabbit Hole.
price=R600 Single. R800 Double. Extra R200.00 for 3rd person.

content=The Rabbit Hole Guest House & Restaurant offers 17 beautiful rooms, all of which have en-suite bathrooms, private balconies with separate entrances and free wi-fi internet access. From the Rabbit Hole it is a short (200m) and pleasant walk to a wide variety of shops and restaurants at the Key West Shopping Centre. The restaurants are all situated on the waterfront of the Pretorius Park Dam. The Rabbit Hole has large gardens, ample safe parking space and an on-site restaurant that offers a charmingly surreal eating experience.
